entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is introduced as the host of the Slug Club 137. He is described as asking Harry and Neville if they know everyone in the room.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a guest at the Slug Club 137. He is described as not knowing some of the other students.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a guest at the Slug Club 137. He is described as not knowing some of the other students.

entities.name: blaise zabini
entities.description: Blaise Zabini is introduced as a Slytherin student in Harry's year. He does not make any sign of recognition or greeting towards Harry and Neville.

entities.name: cormac mclaggen
entities.description: Cormac McLaggen is introduced as a large, wire-haired youth who raises his hand in greeting to Harry and Neville.

entities.name: marcus belby
entities.description: Marcus Belby is introduced as a thin and nervous-looking student who gives a strained smile when Slughorn introduces him.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being squashed in the corner beside Slughorn. She looks unsure of how she got there.
